dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4445707Z] www.beadmaninc.com - stolen content on the website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

MIME element (text/plain) 
[[ This message has been bounced by Cerberus Helpdesk ]] 
Originally sent on Wed Jun 06 2007 08:42PM by austin@austinhamilton.ca: 
 
Hello, 
 
I'm writing regarding one of your customers, BeadManInc.com 
hosted on your server (IP 66.98.208.83). 
 
Content displayed on the website, for example ALL images 
displayed on this page: 
www.beadmaninc.com/hotnew1.html 
were created, are copyrighted, and remain a property of 
Austin Hamilton Inc. 
There is in total several pages of our images being displayed 
on Beadman Inc website. 
 
These images were illegally stolen/copied from our own website 
www.austinhamilton.ca (e.g. from page: 
http://www.austinhamilton.ca/premium_beads.html 1,2,3), 
and then displayed on BeradManInc.com website. 
 
These images were taken, processed and posted by us. 
Also, all items shown on these images are owned, copyrighted 
and trademarked property of Austin Hamilton Inc. 
 
We are asking you to contact your client, Beadman Inc. 
and have them our images REMOVED from their website. 
We would really appreciate your cooperation. 
 
Registrant Contact: 
   Beadmaninc 
   Mangal Das ( ) 
   +91.5422403095 
   Fax: +91.5422403095 
   Lallapura, Varanasi, U.P. 
   Uttar Pradesh 
   Uttar Pradesh, 221002 
   IN 
 
 
 
Best Regards, 
Dan Rokosz 
Director 
Austin Hamilton Inc. 
13700 Mayfield Pl. 
Unit 2205 
Richmond, BC, V6V 2E4 
Canada
